about_the_game: A virtual reality hunting game. Choose between shooting flying ducks in random patterns, hunting a deer or a boar in the open. Every score point you'll get the animals become harder to hit. It's a bit of a relaxing "outdoors" game with low poly graphics. Wildlife VR is perfect for first-time-vr-experience since it's not hard to jump straight into. Choose between three different weapons; Revolver, Shotgun or Sniper-rifle.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Wildlife update 2.0

We've been busy, real busy. We love feedback from players, family and friends. Here are a list of the latest update for Wildlife VR.

  • New textures and materials for the whole game.
  • Added a new gun (Sniper-rifle).
  • Reworked shotgun, should be "usable" now.
  • You are now able to select weapons for each controller (Thumb button).
  • New animal (Boar).
  • New level (Boar-level).
  • Reworked revolver model.
  • Thermos are now physics object.
  • More cans and TVs for shooting-range level.
  • Deer scale reworked, should now be more natural size.
  • Ducks have batter flying-paths.
  • Sound when hitting an animal to confirm hit.
  • Shotgun reload sound is now synced.
  • Deer should only generate one point per hit.
  • Lightning reworked for every level.


About the Game

A virtual reality hunting game. Choose between shooting flying ducks in random patterns, hunting a deer or a boar in the open. Every score point you'll get the animals become harder to hit. It's a bit of a relaxing "outdoors" game with low poly graphics. Wildlife VR is perfect for first-time-vr-experience since it's not hard to jump straight into. Choose between three different weapons; Revolver, Shotgun or Sniper-rifle.
